details.title: Introduction to Programming with Python
details.full_description: Learn programming fundamentals using Python for beginners. This course introduces students to computational thinking, problem-solving, and programming basics. No prior experience required. Students will learn variables, control flow, functions, data structures, and object-oriented programming through hands-on projects and real-world examples.

details.title: Digital Fabrication
